title: Regression gates for trust metrics (swap=0, quality floors)
scope: Encode regression thresholds for MVP trust metrics (swap=0, break rate floor, coverage floor).
Fail CI/guardrails when thresholds are violated on fixtures/golden runs.
Keep thresholds explicit and adjustable in one place.
acceptance: A regression gate script fails builds when swap count > 0 on evaluation fixture.
Thresholds are configured centrally and referenced by the evaluation runner.
Gate outputs are actionable (which metric failed, what value, what threshold).

deliverables.title: Regression gate script
acceptance: Script reads eval_report.json and enforces thresholds deterministically.
Script prints stable, searchable failure messages.

subtasks.title: Implement regression gate and wire into npm run guardrails.
done_when: Guardrails run includes evaluation gate step.
